visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: 'Y-Value Sound Mapping', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#0059dd) for the title and labels, with a font size of 14px for the title and 12px for the labels. The x-axis should have a crosshair with a width of 50 and a color of rgba(90, 140, 210, 0.1). Data series: The series should include one set of data points [1, 2, 2, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11, 13, 6, 7, 1] with the name 'Data Points' and a color of #3070d0. Custom colors: Use the specified color for the series. Additional configurations: Set the chart margins to 50px on all sides, use a light gray background (#f0f0f0), and enable the legend with a position at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration object is designed to render a spline chart with specific styling and data series. The chart title is set to 'Y-Value Sound Mapping' with a dark blue color and a font size of 14px. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with the same dark blue color and a font size of 12px. The x-axis includes a crosshair feature with a width of 50 and a light blue color. The data series includes one set of data points named 'Data Points' with a color of #3070d0. The chart background is set to a light gray color, and the legend is enabled and positioned at the bottom of the chart. Overall, this configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart that meets the specified requirements.
